search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Clubworx (clubworx.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Clubworx can be found at: [https://www.clubworx.com/pricing/](https://www.clubworx.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

“The software is easy to use. The value is exceptional. Right from the get go everything seems to flow… it is laid out simply but has everything you need”

"Fantastic customer service. Our ClubWorx representative has gone above-and-beyond to help us to be able to discover and use many of the amazing features that the ClubWorx program offers. He has even gone so far as to communicate with our I.T. professional so that they have worked together to make things more streamlined for us! We feel very honored and blessed to have found such a great organization and individual reps."

![Image 130](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/607a8e5cd0dacfee75f4f110/607a8e5cd0dacf251df4f217_counter-force.png)

Counterforce Taekwondo, USA

Lynell - Founder

"‘Comprehensive & well priced’ I am an ‘analytics’ type of person; I like to SEE (at a glance) how my Club is performing. I have used other systems; this one consolidates all services – correspondence, accounting; attendance. SO HAPPY 🙂"

![Image 131](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/607a8e5cd0dacfee75f4f110/607a8e5cd0dacf666ff4f218_core-fitness.png)

Core fitness, USA

Den, Owner

Sign up in and get access in less than a minute with pricing plans to suit everyone. Try Clubworx with our 30 day risk free trial, no contracts, upgrade or downgrade at anytime, you're in control.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Additional fees apply for certain features such as mobile member app and martial arts grading events.

“The software is easy to use. The value is exceptional. Right from the get go everything seems to flow… it is laid out simply but has everything you need”

"Fantastic customer service. Our ClubWorx representative has gone above-and-beyond to help us to be able to discover and use many of the amazing features that the ClubWorx program offers. He has even gone so far as to communicate with our I.T. professional so that they have worked together to make things more streamlined for us! We feel very honored and blessed to have found such a great organization and individual reps."

![Image 134](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/607a8e5cd0dacfee75f4f110/607a8e5cd0dacf251df4f217_counter-force.png)

Lynell - Founder
